text:
Do you know what kind of school
we're going to for the next shoot?

What kind of place...
Well, I've heard it's a good school.

I see! I'm looking forward to it!
I wonder if I'll make some friends!

Haha,
with Meguru around, you probably will.

Yeah, Meguru doesn't seem to get too
nervous even meeting new people, right?

But but, when I transferred to elementary school,
I was a little nervous for a bit!

I was nervous too, but I was also really excited...
I hope I can make lots of friends!

What about you, Producer?
Do you get nervous when you work?

I have to support Meguru and
the others with all my might, after all.

Then, I'll do my best to live
up to your full support!
